@graph.name: Brick House Security Telematics Integration - Connected Vehicle Platform - Route4Me Platform
@graph.description:
BrickHouse Security is the top rated global supplier of GPS tracking and security solutions to business, government and consumers with over 12 years experience. Trusted by: -over 500,000 customers -400 of the Fortune 500 -Over 40,000 Small Businesses -2,500+ Law Enforcement agencies -Over half of the Top Retailer 100 List BrickHouse Security is headquartered in New York City and also has offices in Indianapolis, IN. Their areas of expertise include; GPS Tracking, Wireless Alarm Systems, Covert Video Surveillance & TSCM. BrickHouse Security is always on the lookout for new employees that can add value to the company and their clients. Recognised nationwide as the comprehensive vehicle tracking solution provider; Business Vehicle Tracking (BVT) puts you in full control of your fleet. The system can be used to track, trace, evaluate and create greater efficiencies within your fleet. BVT is built on a solid reputation and total service commitment, allowing for transparent pricing and clear service benefits. Austria, United Arab Emirates	Global	No	http://www.fams.me/?utm_source=Route4Me&utm_medium=Telematics4Me&utm_campaign=Route4Me-FAMS-Integration	Customizable Reports, Publicly Accessible API Documentation, Customer Geofencing, Fuel usage reporting, GPS Tracking, RFID Driver ID, Maintenance Schedules
https://route4me.com/integrations/telematics/partners/fleet-harmony	Fleet Harmony	https://apps-static.route4me.com/resources/addons/website-public/img/vendor-logos/fleet-harmony.webp	Fleet Harmony is a worldwide leader and pioneer in Cloud Fleet maintenance and management software applications. The company has experienced more rapid growth since the release of its fleet maintenance / CMMS software, with new customers throughout Canada and the United States coming online every month. The company still provides software development and consulting services for the Internet, Windows, and the IBM iSeries. At Fleet Harmony, they are all about forming and nurturing relationships with their customers. They are first and foremost a software development and service provider with a heavy emphasis on service. They believe that Fleet Harmony Cloud - Fleet maintenance and management is the best trucking software service on the market for companies with small to medium-sized fleets that have heavy equipment repair challenges. They continue to improve and add new features and enhancements to their software as the industry dictates.

@graph.operatingSystem: Web, Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, iOS

isPartOf.name: Route4Me Route Optimization Platform
isPartOf.description: Route optimization and fleet management platform
isPartOf.operatingSystem: Web, Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, iOS

additionalProperty.name: Customizable Reports
additionalProperty.value: Customizable reports in telematics allow users to tailor data analysis to their specific needs, offering insights beyond standard reports. These reports can be created based on various criteria like vehicle, trip, or driver and can include detailed information on fuel usage, driving behavior and more. This flexibility enables businesses to monitor key performance indicators (KPIs), track trends and make data-driven decisions for improved efficiency and safety.

additionalProperty.name: Satellite
additionalProperty.value: Although often used interchangeably, Satellite and GPS tracking refer to different concepts. GPS is a specific satellite-based navigation system operated by the US, consisting of 24 satellites. Satelite is a broader term that includes various satellite networks used for positioning, communication and data transmission, such as Globalstar, Iridium and Inmarsat

additionalProperty.name: Accident/Crash notification
additionalProperty.value: Telematics systems with accident/crash notification features use vehicle data and communication technology to automatically alert emergency services and other relevant parties when a collision is detected. These systems often combine GPS, accelerometers and other sensors to identify accidents, including rollovers and sudden impacts. Upon detection, the system can automatically notify emergency responders, fleet managers, or other designated contacts, providing crucial information like vehicle location and potentially even real-time video footage.

additionalProperty.name: GPS Tracking
additionalProperty.value: Telematics incorporates GPS tracking as a core component, enabling the monitoring of vehicle location and movement. Telematics systems use GPS data, along with other information from the vehicle's on-board diagnostics, to provide a comprehensive view of vehicle performance and driver behavior. This data is transmitted to a central system where it can be analyzed and used for fleet management, improving efficiency and enhancing safety.

additionalProperty.name: Maintenance Schedules
additionalProperty.value: Telematics enhances fleet maintenance by providing data-driven insights for scheduling and optimizing maintenance activities. By tracking vehicle data like mileage, engine hours and fuel consumption, telematics allows for more precise and proactive maintenance, leading to reduced downtime, improved efficiency and lower costs.
